name: Arkham Historical Society
atmosphere: A dusty, cluttered townhouse filled with the decaying remnants of Arkham's past. The air is still and smells of dust and decay.
details: Glass cases filled with yellowed documents and tarnished silverware.
Portraits of stern-faced Arkham founders, their eyes seeming to follow you.
The elderly curator, who is fiercely protective of the collection.
clues: A less-guarded source of historical information than the Miskatonic Library. Contains old maps, family journals, and church records.
